cgcloud__Order_Payment_Inventory_Transac.description: Holds the association details for the order payment template, the inventory template, and the inventory transaction template.

cgcloud__Inventory_Transaction_Template_.description: Reference to the inventory transaction template.

cgcloud__Order_Payment_Template__c.description: Reference to the order payment template.
